nodes.text: The raid on Hagamoor 3 was a raid by Imperial Hand Tahiri Veila on the Moon Maiden mine on the moon Hagamoor 3 of planet Antemeridias. She was following Boba Fett, who was searching for the scientists who created the nanovirus that prevented him from visiting Mandalore, in hopes that the Mandalorian would lead her to Abeloth.
